name: Firefox Australis Windows 8 Appearance
description:
Firefox Australis with Windows 8 Appearance, based on Stephen Horlander's mockup( https://people.mozilla.org/~shorlander/mockups-interactive/australis-interactive-mockups/windows8.html),
and Project Chameleon(http://people.mozilla.org/~jgruen/chameleon/).
additional_info:
Updates:
07.04.2015
* Cleaned up styles for Identity panel
* Added primary button style to more panels
05.04.2015
* More code cleanup
* Experimental primary button style for panels
01.04.2015
* Code cleanup
* Minor fixes
25.03.2015
* Switch to use variables
* Removed support for Firefox up to 30
* Updated Chameleon in-content styling
* Window preferences Chameleon styling
18.11.2014
* Updated style for Default browser notification, Sidebars and Edit bookmark panel
* Updated about:addons
* Restyled preferences subdialogs
* Chameleon style for Page info and preferences window
17.09.2014
* Updated style for Bookmarks toolbar
03.09.2014
* Fixed problem with "Show All Downloads" button in Downloads panel
* Improve panel menu button separator when bookmarks toolbar is shown
01.09.2014
* Removed Australis tabs for Non-Australis Firefox(only change tabs color)
* Updated Awesome bar design
* Updated about:addons page
19.07.2014
* Updated reload/stop/go button by: https://bug868622.bugzilla.mozilla.org/attachment.cgi?id=8458736
* Updated identity box - experimental
* Updated search textbox popup
* Updated Tab Modal Prompt boxes footer buttons
* Simplefied code for back/forward buttons
15.06.2014
* Updated tab separators
* Added option for new find bar style, based on https://people.mozilla.org/~shorlander/mockups/FindBar/Findbar.png
* Updated subview style
* History subview reconstruct
03.06.2014
* Adjust private browsing colors to match with specs - Bug 986635
* Added Chameleon styling for checkboxes and radio buttons
* Experimental sidebars restyling with Chameleon form appearance
24.05.2014
* In-content pages(Addons, Permissions, Preferences) styling based on Project Chameleon mockups - Work in progress
* Change tabs and toolbar color to match Project Chameleon mockups
28.04.2014
* Added bigger star icon in autocomplete popup
* Downloads panel more active downloads area restyle
* Used @2x images on tab curves for all DPI
* Fixed various issues
30.03.2014
* Fixed compatibility problems with non-Australis Firefox
24.03.2014
* Various fixes
* Introduced new slimmer scrollbars in panel subviews
18.03.2014
* Compatibility with the latest Nightly
11.03.2014
* Compatibility with the latest Nightly
* Removed uneeded code
* Removed semi-transparency from popups
12.02.2014
* Removed unneeded code
* Removed bookmarks toolbar animation
* Changed Panel button separator color in Private Browsing
08.02.2014
* Compatibility with the latest Nightly and Aurora
* Minor other fixes
05.02.2014
* Compatibility with the latest Nightly
* Starred bookmark icon and edit bookmark panel icon changed
26.01.2014
* Compatibility with the latest Nightly
* Improved downloads button and panel to match with mockup (Thanks to vicanfon)
09.01.2014
* Added hover effect on toolbar buttons
* Styled Quit button to match with the mockup
* Other improvements
07.01.2014
* Preferences window styling
* Page Info window styling
06.01.2014
* Improved Edit bookmark panel styling
* No more hidding toolbars on about: pages
* Sync panel styling
04.01.2014
* Added animation on toggle bookmarks toolbar
* Slimmer bookmark items to match with mockup
30.12.2013
* Global popups styling
* Global buttons styling
* about:preferences styling
* Fixed compatibility issues
25.12.2013
* Updated tab separators
* UI improvements
24.12.2013
* about:addons and about:permissions styling
* Find bar redesign
* Awesome bar history/bookmarks list styling
* Small other fixes and optimizations
18.12.2013 & 19.12.2013
* Fixed tabs related issues
* Minor code improvements
17.12.2013
* Improved back & forward buttons styling
* Fixed incorrect tabs in Light Weight theme
16.12.2013
* Minor UI fixes
* Updated download items style in Library and about:downloads
15.12.2013
* Library window styling
* Appmenu button flat styling
* Some code optimization
14.12.2013
* Added Australis tabs styling for non-Australis Firefox
* Minor panel improvement
* Fixed downloads button issue
12.12.2013
* Improved dark theme styling for Private Browsing
* Added sidebar styling
* Minor other fixes
11.12.2013
* Added dark theme for Private Browsing
* Improved button styling for Lightweight themes
* Minor other fixes

discussions.name: Problem with the PanelUI button and seperator
Zoom Controls in Bookmarks Toolbar causes it to jump.
Buggy on the latest nightlies/aurora builds (even the standard branch now I believe)

style_setting_options.label: True
